page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MARC
page.content: My name is Marc Wilcox and I am thirteen years old. I am a pupil of Hounsdown School. I get up at 7.3O in the morning and get dressed. At 8.OO a.m. I leave home to catch the bus to school. The bus arrives at 8.1O a.m. and it takes about twenty minutes to get to school. At 8.45 a.m.is registration and at 9.OO a.m. Geography starts. It ends at 1O.15 a.m. and is followed by Maths. At 11.3O a.m. is a fifteen minute break after which is French until lunchtime at 12.55. p.m. After lunch which lasts until 2.O5 p.m. the last lesson of the day is Chemistry which goes on until 3.15 p.m. Then I catch the bus home and arrive at about 3.4O p.m. I get changed and do my paper round, have tea, do my homework and then go out until 9.15.p.m. Then I go to bed!
